sentences.en: "Frankly I found it rather frightening." — "A little startling," Mark agreed.
sentences.cn: “坦白说我觉得这相当可怕。”——“是有点吓人，”马克表示同意。
“你根本不在乎我的感受，是不是。”——“说老实话，是不在乎。”

sentences.en: By any means, we should tell him frankly what we think of his proposal.
sentences.cn: 无论如何, 我们应该直率地告诉他我们对他建议的看法.

sentences.en: Frankly, I don't know what Paul sees in her.
sentences.cn: 坦白地说，我不知道保罗看上她什么了。

sentences.en: Frankly, I think the Internet is overrated.
sentences.cn: 坦率地说，我认为因特网被高估了。

sentences.en: Frankly, I'd just as lief stay.
sentences.cn: 坦白地说, 我愿意留下来.

sentences.en: Frankly, Thomas, this question of your loan is beginning to worry me.
sentences.cn: 老实讲，托马斯，你贷款的问题开始让我担心了。

sentences.en: He answered frankly and truthfully all my questions.
sentences.cn: 他坦率而真诚地回答了我的所有问题.

sentences.en: He felt he had a relationship strong enough to talk frankly to Sarah.
sentences.cn: 他认为和萨拉的关系很紧密，足以推心置腹。

sentences.en: He now frankly admits that much of his former playboy lifestyle was superficial.
sentences.cn: 他现在坦率承认自己以前浪荡不羁的生活方式很大程度上都是浅薄的。

sentences.en: He spoke frankly about the ordeal.
sentences.cn: 他直率地讲出了苦难的经历。
他的行为老实说是可耻的。

sentences.en: It's a tacky, nasty little movie, frankly.
sentences.cn: 坦率地说,那是一部低级下流 、 微不足道的影片.

sentences.en: Speak frankly and don't beat about the bush.
The publicity-shy singer spoke frankly in his first interview in three years.
sentences.cn: 这位不喜欢抛头露面的歌手在3年来的首次访谈中畅所欲言。

sentences.en: To speak frankly, I don't like the idea at all.
sentences.cn: 老实说, 我一点也不赞成这个主意.

sentences.en: You can talk frankly to me.

trans.tran_cn: 直率地（说），坦诚地，真诚地，坦白地，平心而论
trans.tran_en: used to show that you are saying what you really think about something
